Title: How to Use the Azure Pricing Calculator Effectively – A Step-by‐Step Guide
Description:
When you’re planning to move workloads to Microsoft Azure, one of the first questions that comes up is simple but important: *How much is this going to cost?*

Cloud pricing can be tricky. Between different regions, service tiers, storage options, and licensing models, it’s easy to underestimate or overestimate costs. Thankfully, Microsoft provides a free tool called the **Azure Pricing Calculator** to help you get a clear, customized cost estimate before you deploy anything.

In this guide, we’ll walk through how to use the calculator effectively, the best practices for accurate estimates, and a few tips that can help you plan your Azure budget with confidence.
